query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('kubevirt_vmi_storage_write_times_ms_total') | extend vmiName = tostring(Labels.name) | extend vmiNamespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend vmiNode = tostring(Labels.node) | extend vmiDrive = tostring(Labels.drive) | extend DeltaTimeWrite = DeltaTimeSeconds | extend DeltaWriteTime = DeltaVal | join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_write_total') | extend vmiName = tostring(Labels.name) | extend vmiNamespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend vmiNode = tostring(Labels.node) | extend vmiDrive = tostring(Labels.drive) | extend DeltaTimeTotal = DeltaTimeSeconds | extend DeltaWriteTotal = DeltaVal) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, vmiNode, vmiNamespace, vmiName, vmiDrive | summarize AvgWriteTimeRate = (sum(DeltaWriteTime) / 1000) / sum(DeltaTimeWrite), AvgWriteTotalRate = sum(DeltaWriteTotal) / sum(DeltaTimeTotal) by Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, vmiNode, vmiNamespace, vmiName, vmiDrive | where AvgWriteTotalRate > 0 | extend Latency = AvgWriteTimeRate / AvgWriteTotalRate
